website_summaries.verdict: A premium tap and drill set that delivers a great combination of affordability and durability.
pros: Includes a high-quality hex shank to provide a strong connection to a drill chuck
Designed for tapping up to 10-gauge metal
Back is tapered beyond the tap to prevent thread damage from over-drilling
Hardened steel construction delivers immense strength and versatility
cons: Drill tap bits tend to arrive dull, and they may break easily, even after limited use

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good. excellent Case.
customer_reviews.text: We drill and tap into stainless steel posts for glass fences and railings. We were very surprised at how well this product worked. We tested it drilling into 1/8" thick round stainless posts and it performed well. Much easier than drilling and tapping. We also used a spray drill/tap lubricant foam which worked well. Not sure how long each tap will last. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Breaks when tapping on Angle iron!!
customer_reviews.text: The drill 6-32 tap broke while trying to tap a hole in an angle iron 1/8 inch thick. I even used metal cutting fluid to reduce the friction and cool the bit. But did not help...with 4 or 5 second of drilling the bit broke. Very disappointed. Would not recommend to buyers
customer_reviews.author: BKS

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but I recomend predrilling unless you are using them on THIN metal.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but do NOT try to drill, tap, and countersink all in one step with thicker metal.... That is a pipe dream. But the drill tip is excellent to get the bit aligned. I predrilled appropriate sized holes make process easier. Beware of twisting motion on smaller bits will cause ANY tap to snap off. Tapping holes is an art and a skill... if you are a novice, you will have to learn no matter what brand you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: If the product would have worked as advertised would have been a great tool. I broke 3 of the bits tight away. Smallest one broke on first pass. Then next one up drilled/taped one hole and broke on second hole. The next size then did the same thing. Not worth the money. Also, I was drilling/tapping 1/8 inch thick tubing. Was using a lubricant and going at a slow speed.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great help on old metal boxes
customer_reviews.text: As an electrician who does service work on old houses, these are incredibly convenient. I used to have to find the right drill bit to attach a ground wire to the old metal boxes, and nobody like to use ground clips. Getting old boxes up to code is not a problem anymore. It takes 2 seconds to drill/tap the hole, I stick in my ground screw and I'm done. Couldn't have asked for a better product and don't go into old houses without these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dov B.

customer_reviews.title: This product will strip.
customer_reviews.text: Decent stripping machine. I do agree with some of the reviews that the cutting wheel is a bit misaligned. There isn’t enough play to wedge the cutting wheel straight but if you make or hold the wire offset to the blade, it will strip. Once the offset of the wire fed is misaligned the wire will slip off the blade. Other than that, this product will strip.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drill/tap set
customer_reviews.text: So far i am really happy with this set of drill taps. Ive done a few holes in 1/8" aluminum and 1/4" plexiglass without a problem. I did use aluminum tap fluid/oil. I think that’s key to keeping the taps from breaking. Plus it smells like cinnamon for some reason! Also go slow and don't put your full weight on it. Practice on a few scrap pieces to get the hang of it. Try a center punch to keep it from walking off the intended target. The bit adapter/extender isn't great, it wobbles a bit so I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian MazurskyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Greenlee DTAPKIT
customer_reviews.text: The Greenlee DTAPKIT is the way to go. These are very durable. It takes longer to put the bit in your drill than it takes to drill, tap and ream. I've used a couple of the bits numerous times & they are still as sharp as the day I purchased them. I just wished I had these years ago. Very Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blind woodcrafter

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift and well-satisfied receipent!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product to my son-in-law and he was very happy to receive it! Excited to use it. It arrived on the date promised and was packaged well. Can't rate any other aspect at this time but I will wait for his feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: so far Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: i have only used it on aluminum and plastic so far, but so far my experience has been good. word update..: would strongly suggest getting a set of drill bits to go with this set, if your going to drill into anything more then 1/4 inch thick... it is just wise practice to have the whole hole drilled out first. my smallest bit in this case broke on me but it is my experience with all small drill bits so i am not going to mark it down yet... next time i will take my time with a cheap drill bit before using this to tap the hole.
customer_reviews.author: random spaz 219

customer_reviews.title: must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any electrician. Need to put a 10-32 ground screw in an old 1900 box? No problem! Takes 5 seconds. Stripped plaster rings? No problem! I've even threaded big I beams for 1/4-20. For this i used a drill bit first to avoid snapping the drill tap. I love these drill taps. Turn 2 steps into 1!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a commercial electrician I found this to be a great tool and time saver. They are the most common size you need and with the case it keeps them handy. I would used them for mechanics work to.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased a set of taps from Harbor Freight which lasted for about 10 taps into 3/16" aluminum and then were useless. Saw this set with the built-in drill. First job I had to do was 10-32 into 1/4" aluminum. It did a fantastic job once I pre-drilled the holes with a slightly smaller drill bit before using the combination drill/tap. Have not used on any other materials yet but based on how well it tapped 1/4" aluminum, it should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great tap set
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually amazed at how long I’ve had this set without replacing any of the bits. Granted, I’ve only used them for light gauge electrical boxes, maybe some as thick as 1/8th inch, but I’ve used them ALOT. Mostly 1/4”/20, 6/32 and 8/32, but I’ve used all the bits at some point, and not one has broken yet. Slow, straight with moderate pressure and maybe a little cutting oil on the thicker gauged metal, and these will last you.
customer_reviews.author: Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: I want to start by saying I pre drilled very hole with a separate bit to minimize the risk of breaking one of these. I used aluminum since it was strong enough for my need but soft to drill into. I was able to thread some aluminum stock and mount things into toyota bed rails with these. Anyone that has looked at factory parts for this knows what a bargain that is. I made brackets to hold generic bike mounts(purchased on Amazon) and it worked great. Used low speed on an 18 volt drill and all went as expected. Have only used 2 largest sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice drill and tap set in one. Very handy for drilling and upsizing thread sizes. Also comes in a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: WILPOWR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Case locking piece is loose.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and quality seems on par with what one expects from Greenlee. The case locking piece is too loose, making the case inconveniently open often.
customer_reviews.author: Kevbo

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Drill and taps are great, just make sure you are drilling straight, or you will snap the bit
customer_reviews.author: Sundelll

customer_reviews.title: Greenlee Combo Drill/Tap Set Is Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The Greenlee Combo Drill/Tap Set is Simply Amazing. In the 45 years I've been an electrician, this is the fastest and easiest way that I've found to tap machine screw threads into metal. Greenlee tools are top of the line and this is definitely a FIVE STAR product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Owenby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Execution of an Excellent Idea
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know these things existed 'til I started poking around on Amazon. I needed to tap some holes in a trailer frame (mild steel). Using a drill press was out of the question, so I tried these and am very pleased with the result. One hint: Drill a pilot hole with a smaller drill first to help things along--it takes a little longer overall, but the tapping process itself will go much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on just about any material. I have used these anywhere from electrical panels to aluminum tubing and they perform and last. Be sure to use a little cutting oil and you will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendal Hadaway

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended!
customer_reviews.text: Used these to repair the door lock plate screws on a security screen door (a bit thicker than sheet metal). I used my Milwaukee M12 Fuel drill instead of the impact driver, and set the clutch to a really low setting (2-4 near the minimum end of the torque scale). Be sure to use tapping oil, and driver is very carefully. Overall, very satisfied with the quality and the carrying case is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: aTypicalEngineer808

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: These are simply awesome. They tap perfectly and save a lot of time. I use a torque limited driver and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog Engineer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Convenience And A Quality Tool
customer_reviews.text: On the downside, if you break one of these you've broken a tap and a drill. But that's a small price to pay for the convenience of having a hex bit drill, countersink and tap all in one. I use these for building electrical panels and now I no longer need two cordless drills - one for the tap and one for the drill bit. This is another great product from Greenlee.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Layne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: These things rock. I used them to install lights on my utility trailer and it was so easy to drill and tap the hole all in one motion. I did break one bit, but replacements are available for each size here on amazon. It was my fault it broke. I started off trying to drill pilot holes and the bit caught and broke. After I stopped drilling pilot holes I never had a problem again. After drilling/tapping over twenty holes the bit still worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bowepr

customer_reviews.title: This unique concept and the good Greenlee quality make these very useful and well priced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a specific project. The piece on which I was working had 4 bolt threads that were different that for the bolts I needed to use. I put the correct bit in the drill press and within 10 minutes had the 4 holes rethreaded and ready to use. This unique concept and the good Greenlee quality make these very useful and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Where were these all my life?!?!
customer_reviews.text: These rate right up there with sliced bread, and if you are a bee, knees. Drill and tap back panels in one motion. It saves so much time. I have found they work best if you are careful to stop before the tap clears the back of the panel, this way you avoid cutting two sets of threads. Just stop before the tap goes all the way through and reverse out. Done! You just can't beat them for panel work.
customer_reviews.author: Setesh

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: Have been tapping ss and mild steel flawlessly for weeks. Be sure to use some cutting oil even if tapping softer metals.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D.

customer_reviews.title: 100+ holes and no slowing down
customer_reviews.text: Drilling and taping 100+ 10-32 holes into 1/8" steel with no indication of loss of ability. I'd clearly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve OKC

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I've wished they would make this tool for many years. Greatly engineered, designed, and constructed. Greenlee quality is consistent. These bits are strong, durable, and run great with a drill. Have some common sense and slow it down when it hits the threads. Cutting oil goes a long way also. Anyone having any trouble with this tool is a common idiot.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Q. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I found myself doing a fair amount of electrical recently and these things work great for tapping holes into electrical boxes for grounding screws. I had some tight spots that were a challenge enough as it is so it was nice having this set around to make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: tjr.gsa

customer_reviews.title: A goodie
customer_reviews.text: Thisis one of those tools you don't need but once you use it you realize you have been doing it the hard way all this time. It makes drilling tapping and cleaning the hole vey easy in one simple step, saves time which as we know = money. Do be careful with the smaller bits as I have heard of them breaking easily, probably due to a poor angle or speed (fyi: mine have not)
customer_reviews.author: Phlip

customer_reviews.title: Broken on first use
customer_reviews.text: I used the drill/tap 8-32 holes. These small traps are very delicate. Probably ok for sheetmetal but nothing thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: Greenlee DTAPKIT 6-32 to 1/4-20 6-Piece Combination Drill and Tap Set that I need it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality for excellent price! You must have it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Zev

customer_reviews.title: Drill and Tap Combo Set
customer_reviews.text: Use the taps all the time for aluminum storefront doors to create threaded holes 1/4x20. Bits fit or 1/4" Dewalt impact driver
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Walters

customer_reviews.title: Time saver that gets it done.
customer_reviews.text: Love this universal tool drill and tap at same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery K.

customer_reviews.title: A great time saving idea.
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! Why didn't I think of this. One step screw hole tapping. Be sure to use a bit of cutting oil, and tap your heart away. I am not sure hop long these will last if used daily, but this set is just perfect for my needs. I also bought the 5/16 and 3/8 bits. It is nice that these is extra room on the plastic case for additional bits.
customer_reviews.author: A. Troskoski

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all electricians!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for all electricians. Easy to carry in your tool bag with convenient bit,tap and deburr for most common electrical needs.I don't use the drill adaptor,just chuck it up in your drill and your set. I drilled and taped 30 conductive hole in unistrut with no signs of dulling.Great price!
customer_reviews.author: KR Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good tools!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Greenlee tools for more than 40 years and have yet to find a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: RBC

customer_reviews.title: I love these but it doesn't take too much to snap ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these but it doesn't take too much to snap them off. I realize that operator error is always a factor. The case is nice. There is space for duplicate bits.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Somehow got this for a steal from seller. Does its job so far. See how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Leah A. Oatman

customer_reviews.title: Someone needs to come up with a high torque low speed cordless drill and we're good.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this to drill and tap 1.6 to 2.5 mm aluminum sheet. You need to control your drill speed. For cordless drill, use slow speed with light pressure. If you use a denser metal, use the Forney 20857 Cutting Fluid, Industrial Pro Tap Magic. Someone needs to come up with a high torque low speed cordless drill and we're good.
customer_reviews.author: Hanh Dang

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to drill and tap four holes for 6-32 screws in an electrical box, and major and minor diameters for 6-32 screws are very close. Instead of having to sort out an appropriately sized drill prior to tapping, having the drill and the tap combined into one tool made the operation very simple.
customer_reviews.author: james_98188

customer_reviews.title: Electrician essential
customer_reviews.text: Great Greenlee product at 1/2 the price of my local supply house.
customer_reviews.author: Carl129

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. One stroke drill tap and chamfer. Very useful if you are assembling an electrical panel that needs 36 holes drilled and tapped. Makes work go faster and easy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These things are better than sliced bread! Super time saver!
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! I had been having problems with window cranks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I had been having problems with window cranks, that would just not fit, because the screws that come with the newer window cranks are bigger than the older window cranks. I used this several times, and now the new window cranks fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle22

customer_reviews.title: These break rather easily, but if you take your time they will ...
customer_reviews.text: These break rather easily, but if you take your time they will last you and save you quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Radar

customer_reviews.title: Drill and Tap Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product from Amazon because their price was half of all retail stores. I think everyone wants to save money. This item is very useful because it is a drill/tap combo and you only need one tool. This keeps the old tool bag from becoming overloaded. This is a tool that every electrician needs in theeir possession.
customer_reviews.author: Walter C. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product and was as good as it said it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set is very high quality and ill get a lot of use from it.
customer_reviews.author: kdb

customer_reviews.title: learning curve must not hit tip on table while taping it causes it to snap shank from push pull torque but save time and works g
customer_reviews.text: very empressive tool, learning curve must not hit tip on table while taping it causes it to snap shank from push pull torque but save time and works great must keep little oil on threads taping part. must have item when fabing panel
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fair price
customer_reviews.text: High quality good price has all the USA standard thread sizes needed for most home electrical install or repair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aha the simple life of one step does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much am a DIY kind of guy and if I have to drill a hole that will need threading? Why use the 2 step method when you can get it done in one step?
customer_reviews.author: Randall Jacobsen Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Note for those breaking these: this isn't a normal drill bit, you cannot just go full speed with a drill. That's why on normal taps they have the rectangle ends to stop people from putting them into a drill chuck.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Works very nice. Had a problem with some of the taps ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very nice. Had a problem with some of the taps not fitting in quick adapter and customer service handled it awesomely. All the taps that did work and fit works outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: David Lisowe

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, well made
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for rethreading screw holes or turning #6 holes into #8s. Or putting holes just where you need them. These have been a big time saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Rhum

customer_reviews.title: Great tool kit just wish my case that came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool kit just wish my case that came with it to have the latch to keep it closed....that's the only reason for 4 stars. Others taps work excellent so far
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the toolbag !
customer_reviews.text: Any electrician should not be without this. I keep it in my tool bag. It's small enough to take with you. No more tri tap. Those break and replacements aren't always available. Also the tri tap is so too long sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike NJ

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Partner but after one use it was broken
customer_reviews.author: Perlie

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this in plastic but so far I have no complaints. Hopefully this is something that I can add to my toolbox so I can carry less weight but have more flexibility
customer_reviews.author: MisterC05

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fast and easy way to drill and tap nearly any hole an electrician will need
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Drill and Tap Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Easy to use - super convenient. Great holding case. Very well built.
customer_reviews.author: rayktwo

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than a traditional tap/die set
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and useful. Follow the directions and remember to go slow. If you do you will be rewarded by this great product. Now I'll have to buy the metric set, or at least the M6 & M8 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Roger G.

customer_reviews.title: Order a set.  They're incredible.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. Zipped through a sheet metal assembly project in 1/4 the time. Greenlee rocks. I liked these so much I purchased three more sets and gave them away to friends! These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Seedman

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: As an electrician, I use this drill and tap set all the time. Good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Tool To Own
customer_reviews.text: As always Greenlee dose it right. This is a time saving, and very well made. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: QUICK, SIMPLE, RELIABLE DRILLING AND TAPPING IN ALUMINUM TABLE LEGS
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an easy method to drill and tap lightweight metal, this product is perfect. I used the drill taps so that I could attach sway bars to folding table legs, and was able to simply use my old electric drill (don't have room for a drill press in the garage), had great results. Used the drill tap twice on 10 different table legs, was simple and reliable each time. For casual users, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Darl S

customer_reviews.title: gerat one
customer_reviews.text: well designed and good quality. A little bit short for wood tapping jobs. But ok for metal tapping jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Tbag

customer_reviews.title: Timesavers
customer_reviews.text: These bit combinations are time saving and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: BudHimes

customer_reviews.title: These works great! I used these for a DIY 1/4 tubing ...
customer_reviews.text: These works great! I used these for a DIY 1/4 tubing mister system in my backyard. Now I am A LOT cooler on those hot days!
customer_reviews.author: Sentinel

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected and saves me time. Not sure on durability yet as i only have to use it occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Hvac 14+ years

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s made by greenlee so I knew it was going to do exactly what it was intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Love these taps
customer_reviews.text: Love these taps. They are 2 flute so they clean out the hole very well and chamfer the threaded hole for easy threading of the bolt. Every handy man needs these!
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A great drill and tap tool kit. It comes in handy in many different applications.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double your assembly time with this nifty kit!
customer_reviews.text: Putting together backboards for control panels. This speeds my assembly a lot saving me time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Blessing

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Greenlee out did themselves here. Great product just wish Greenlee didn't have the only patten so u could get the cheaper
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: Dtapkit works
customer_reviews.text: I used this set at work and bought this one for home use. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Murakami

customer_reviews.title: Greenlee rocks when they are on!
customer_reviews.text: Very good, Klein has similar kit that comes with an extra bit. Used this one a few times & it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ala Al

customer_reviews.title: Greenlee Products are QUALITY made tools.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item as promised. It is a great tool set. I would like to have the next 5 sizes of drill & taps.
customer_reviews.author: TLTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: 8/32 cutter broke first time I used it wouldn't buy it a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: There Great! If you decide to give it a negative comment than you didn't you use it the proper way, there made for exactly what you buy them for ;to "thread out ". Awesome "5Stars"
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing on 1/8" aluminum 1/2" or thicker it seams to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing on 1/8" aluminum 1/2" or thicker it seams to help drilling a pilot hole first. So much better than a traditional hand threader.
customer_reviews.author: Mazin Dajani

customer_reviews.title: ... used them yet but the seem to be very good I'm going to use them in my milling machine
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them yet but the seem to be very good I'm going to use them in my milling machine.
customer_reviews.author: G. DeMarco's Lone wolfe bead company DD CNC milling

customer_reviews.title: Great Innovation
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and hoping they hold up over time to the abuse I give them as a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Tanar

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Loved it the minute i saw the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Loved it the minute i saw the electrician pull it out of his tool box.
customer_reviews.author: est

customer_reviews.title: I really like these Greenlee
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Greenlee, one step drill, tap, and debur tools. They are high end tools and they work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Luther

customer_reviews.title: Great timesaver
customer_reviews.text: ability to drill & tap in one step is great.
customer_reviews.author: N. B.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all-in one product. Drill, tap and countersink all at once! Definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for a common issue.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for when you need to pigtail an outlet or fixture into a box that doesn't have a threaded hole in it to put the ground screw into.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For a Journeyman electrician this drill & tap is worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph  Jones

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN " CHINA "
customer_reviews.text: Greenlee is taking a step forward in making an all in one tool, The DTAPKIT 6-32 To 1/4-20 Drill, Tape Set; I will give them some credit for trying. But the bits are made of cheap metal and will snap on you in the field, Ether when first used or later on, it will snap, it did it to me. I am certified Electrician for I.B.E.W Local 11 Building a Better Los Angeles. I have tested this product personally, and if you purchase this product, Just keep in mind, it will snap on you. The Adapter "IS AWESOME" this is the only thing that won’t snap on you.
customer_reviews.author: Giovani

customer_reviews.title: Nice! It makes quick work of drilling + tapping in one fell swoop.
customer_reviews.text: These are super handy to have on hand. It makes quick work of drilling + tapping in one fell swoop.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This works great for that
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I need to drill holes, and I need screws to then fit in those holes without a nut on the other side. This works great for that. You should buy it, really. No I mean it, like right now. Why haven't you clicked that Add to cart button yet, it's right there > or maybe up there ^ it's yellow, you can't miss it, unless your color blind, then I guess it's just a gray button. These drills seem to be pretty nice quality, I haven't broken any yet, and I use the smaller two sizes the most, in both metal and plastic boxes. I was skeptical at first but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy on the Internet

customer_reviews.title: he says they work fine and he likes them
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for husband. he says they work fine and he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to your tool box.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a refinery and I broke the tip off of a screw while tightening it. Sometimes you can't tell when a screw has dirt, rust, and something else in the hole where you're tighting it in. Well....these handly little tools erases your mistake! This cute little box is an excellent addition to go in your tool box and well worth the money for the hassles in finding the right size drill bit and tap bit. You have both in one! I strongly recommend it to anyone who constantly deals with screws in the construction trade. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Garcia

product_meta.title: Greenlee DTAPKIT COMBINATION DRILL/TAP BIT SET
product_meta.description:
Size:6-32 to 1/4-20NON-METRIC TYPE; 6 PIECE(S); (6) DRILL/TAP SET CONTENT; #6-32 TPI TO 1/4 INCH-20 TPI TAP SIZES; HARDENED HIGH SPEED STEEL DRILL MATERIAL; GREENLEE BRAND; SHANK SIZE 1/4 INCH; CUT MATERIAL MILD STEEL, COPPER, BRASS, ALUMINUM; MATERIAL THICKNESS 10 GAUGE

AMAZON.COM


Drill

view larger Tap

view larger Countersink

view larger 
One bit that does it all. Drill, Tap and Countersink in a single operation.

Greenlee combination bits for drilling, tapping, and countersinking--all with one bit. view larger Greenlee drill/tap combination bits are a high-quality solution when you need to drill, tap, and countersink a hole quickly and accurately.

Previously to create a threaded hole you would have to perform three separate operations, each requiring its own tool: a drill bit, a tap, and a countersink tool.

The Greenlee combination bits perform all three operations with one bit, providing you with the same accuracy and power in a simple, fast, and easy-to-use package. A quick change adapter is also included to help you to drill, tap, and countersink, and even drive fasteners even faster.

For use with up to 10-gauge mild steel, the Greenlee combination bits make drilling, tapping, and countersinking holes faster and easier than ever before.

Case included for easy transport and storage. 
view larger 
HIGHLIGHTS
 * Drill, tap, and countersink in one quick and easy action
 * Just as precise and considerably faster than using standard bits, tapping, and countersinking tools
 * Hardened high-grade tool steel construction for use in up to 10-gauge metal
 * Back-tapered to avoid damage from over drilling
 * Strong hex shank ensures strong connection to drill
 * Quick change adapter included for easy bit switching

INCLUDED COMPONENTS
Designed to drill, tap, and countersink up to 10-gauge mild steel, the Greenlee DTAPKIT comes with the following sizes:

view larger 
Model Number Description DTAP6-326-32NC Drill and Tap Bit DTAP8-328-32NC Drill and Tap Bit DTAP10-2410-24NC Drill and Tap Bit DTAP10-3210-32NF Drill and Tap Bit DTAP12-2412-24NC Drill and Tap Bit DTAP1/4-201/4-20NC Drill and Tap Bit A compact plastic case and quick change adapter are also included. Replacement and extra bits sold separately. A metric drill-and-tap kit is also available. (Model DTAPKITM KIT)

ABOUT GREENLEE
Founded in 1862, Greenlee is a leader when it comes to developing innovative tools for the professional tradesperson. From barrel-making beginnings to the present day selection of wire/cable installation tools, electronic testing and measurement instruments, and other solutions, Greenlee continues to be a respected and trusted source for both professional and enthusiast tools. Whatever your tooling need, you can always rely on Greenlee to make your job faster, safer, and easier.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Complete hole drilling, tapping and deburring/countersinking in one operation with power drill saves labor and time. Back tapered beyond tap to prevent thread damage from over-drilling. Deburr/countersink also provided on bit beyond back taper. Made from hardened high-speed steel vs. carbon steel for longer life. High quality hex shank to ensure strong connection to drill chuck. Designed to tap up to 10-gauge metal. Quick change adaptor and case included.

See more

Back tapered beyond tap to prevent thread damage from over-drilling
Deburr/countersink also provided on bit beyond back taper
Made from hardened high-speed steel vs carbon steel for longer life
